comments:
Description:
Exception when preview report with output parameter in Web Viewer

Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview attached report in Web viewer
The report contains parameter from store procedure

Result:
report report:
- There are errors evaluating script "row["op"]".

Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
